Safari, and has nothing to do with editing or Aloha.-->\n\n<script >\n\t(function(document,navigator,standalone) {\n\t\t// prevents links from apps from opening in mobile safari\n\t\t// this javascript must be the first script in your <head>\n\t\tif ((standalone in navigator) && navigator[standalone]) {\n\t\t\tvar curnode, location=document.location, stop=/^(a|html)$/i;\n\t\t\tdocument.addEventListener('click', function(e) {\n\t\t\t\tcurnode=e.target;\n\t\t\t\twhile (!(stop).test(curnode.nodeName)) {\n\t\t\t\t\tcurnode=curnode.parentNode;\n\t\t\t\t}\n\t\t\t\t// Conditions to do this only on links to your own app\n\t\t\t\t// if you want all links, use if('href' in curnode) instead.\n\t\t\t\tif(\n\t\t\t\t\t'href' in curnode && // is a link\n\t\t\t\t\t(chref=curnode.href).replace(location.href,'').indexOf('#') && // is not an anchor\n\t\t\t\t\t(\t!(/^[a-z\\+\\.\\-]+:/i).test(chref) ||                       // either does not have a proper scheme (relative links)\n\t\t\t\t\t\tchref.indexOf(location.protocol+'//'+location.host)===0 ) // or is in the same protocol and domain\n\t\t\t\t) {\n\t\t\t\t\te.preventDefault();\n\t\t\t\t\tlocation.href = curnode.href;\n\t\t\t\t}\n\t\t\t},false);\n\t\t}\n\t})(document,window.navigator,'standalone');\n</script>        \n\n<!-- This style sets the minimum size of a blurb to 260 px unless there is {\n            $('.detailcard, .maincardContainer').toggleClass('showdetail');\n        }\n\n        function showSchedule() {\n            if (window.scrollPosition != undefined) {\n                $(window).scrollTop(scrollPosition);\n            }\n            $('.detailcard, .maincardContainer, .detailcard2').removeClass("showdetail");\n            $('.detailcard, .maincardContainer, .detailcard2').removeClass("showdetail2");\n            $("#showScheduleButton").addClass("invisible");\n        }\n\n        function setDetailInfo(element) {\n            var eventID = element.id;\n            /*Store the event id in a place where we can get it in SetDetail2Info*/\n            document.eventID = element.id;\n            $.ajax({\n                url: "/ajax/schedule_detail",\n                type: "POST",\n                data: {\n                    eventID: eventID,\n                    csrfmiddlewaretoken: csrftoken,\n                },\n                success: function (data) {\n                    $("#detailcard").html(data);\n                    MathJax.Hub.Typeset();\n                },\n                error: function (jqXHR, textStatus, errorThrown) {\n                    $("#detailcard").html(textStatus);\n                }\n\n\n            })\n        }\n\n        function setDetail2Info(userID) {\n            $.ajax({\n                url: "/ajax/schedule_detail",\n                type: "POST",\n                data: {\n                    userID: userID,\n                    eventID2: document.eventID,\n                    csrfmiddlewaretoken: csrftoken,\n                },\n                success: function (data) {\n                    $("#detailcard2").html(data);\n                    MathJax.Hub.Typeset();\n                },\n                error: function (jqXHR, textStatus, errorThrown) {\n                    $("#detailcard2").html(textStatus);\n                }\n            })\n        }\n\n        function showDetail(eventID) {\n            window.location.assign("/Conferences/2024/Schedule?showEvent=" + eventID);\n        }\n\n        function showSpeaker(speakerID) {\n            var params = $.param({showSpeaker: speakerID});\n            window.location.assign("/Conferences/2024/Schedule?" + params);\n        }\n\n\n        function setSearchToSearchSchedule() {\n            /*Change the search form on the main page to point to /searchschedule rather than /search*/\n            $("#nips-search").parent().parent().attr("action", "/Conferences/2024/Schedule");\n            $("#nips-search").attr("placeholder", "Search Schedule");\n        }\n\n\n        setSearchToSearchSchedule();\n\n\n        function filterType(element) {\n            var filter = element.textContent.trim();\n\n            let params = new URLSearchParams(window.location.search)\n            if (filter != "Show All") {\n                params.set("type", filter);\n            } else {\n                params.delete("type")\n            }\n            ;\n            window.location.search = params.toString()\n            console.log("new window.location", window.location)\n        }\n\n        function filterDay(element) {\n\n            let params = new URLSearchParams(window.location.search)\n            if (element != "ShowAll") {\n                params.set("day", element);\n            } else {\n                params.delete("day")\n            }\n            ;\n            window.location.search = params.toString()\n            console.log("new window.location", window.location)\n\n        }\n\n        function clearFilter() {\n\n            let params = new URLSearchParams(window.location.search)\n            params.delete("type")\n            params.delete("day")\n            window.location.search = params.toString()\n            console.log("new window.location", window.location)\n        }\n\n\n        $().ready(function () {\n            var showEventID = "";\n            if (showEventID != "") {\n                element = $("#maincard_" + showEventID)[0];\n                showDetail(element);\n            }\n            if ($(".maincard.Poster").length == 0) {\n                $("#posterToggle").addClass("hidden");\n            }\n        })\n\n\n    </script>\n\n\n\n    \n        </div>\n    \n\n</main>\n<!--END BLOCK CONTENT-->\n\n\n<!--Footer for the edit button-->\n\n\n<script>\n\n    $(function () {\n        if ($(".editable").length == 0) {\n            $("#editFooter").hide();\n        }\n    })\n</script>\n\n<script src="/static/core/js/fastclick.min.js" ></script>\n\n<!--We don't know if there are editable tags on the page until after the django template engine has rendered the page. So,\ntest in javascript for "editable" tags and if present, load the ckeditor engine dynamically. -->\n\n<script>\n    if (document.getElementsByClassName('editable').length > 0) {\n        var script = document.createElement("script");\n        script.type = "text/javascript";\n        script.src = "/static/core/ckeditor/4.18/ckeditor.js";    // use this for linked script\n        script.text = "alert('voila!');"               // use this for inline script\n        document.body.appendChild(script);\n    }\n\n</script>\n\n\n<script>\n    function fetchContent() {\n        $(".editable").each(function (index) {\n            debugger\n            var myself = this;\n            var docvID = this.getAttribute('id').replace("id_", "");\n            var blurbtext = this.getAttribute("blurbtext");\n            $.ajax({\n                url: "/Admin/RetrieveDocumentVersion",\n                type: "POST",\n                data: {\n                    docvID: docvID,\n                    blurbtext: blurbtext,\n                    csrfmiddlewaretoken: csrftoken,\n                },\n                success: function (data, textStatus, jqXHR) {\n                    myself.setAttribute("contenteditable", "true");\n                    myself.innerHTML = data;\n                    CKEDITOR.inline(myself.id);\n                },\n            });\n        })\n    }\n\n    $("#nopageedit").hide();\n\n    function start_edit() {\n\n        $(".editable").addClass("warning-ring");\n\n        //At the beginning of an edit, we need to replace the content of the\n        //editable div with it's databased content in order to preserve the\n        //template tags. We want the tag, not the rendered tag.\n\n        /* You must remove any countdown.js timers on the page before replacing the page with it's\n        document version otherwise, Javascript will throw an exception.  */\n\n\n        $("[class$='-countdown']").parent().remove();\n        fetchContent();\n        $(".editable").attr("onblur", "ckeditorsave(this)");\n        window.status.bold();\n        window.status = "Click outside the editable area to save. Changes are LIVE!! Refresh page to discard changes.";\n        $("#editpage").hide();\n        $("#noeditpage").show();\n    }\n\n\n    function stop_edit() {\n        ckeditorsave();\n        $("#noeditpage").hide();\n        $("#editpage").show();\n        window.location.reload();\n    }\n\n    function ckeditorsave(event) {\n        for (var name in CKEDITOR.instances) {\n            if (CKEDITOR.instances[name].checkDirty()) {\n                editor = CKEDITOR.instances[name];\n                saveEditable(editor);\n            }\n        }\n    }\n\n    function saveEditable(editor) {\n        var content = editor.getData();\n        var contentId = editor.name;\n        var pageId = window.location.pathname;\n        var originalContent = "N/A";\n        var documentversion = editor.container.getAttribute("id").replace("id_", "");\n        var blurbtext = editor.container.getAttribute("blurbtext");\n        if (contentId.match(/-aloha$/gi)) {\n            contentId = contentId.replace(/-aloha/gi, '');\n        }  /*I'm not sure what this does but it seems like it would matter*/\n        var request = jQuery.ajax({\n            url: "/Admin/SaveDocument",\n            type: "POST",\n            async: false,\n            data: {\n                content: content,\n                originalContent: originalContent,\n                contentId: contentId,\n                pageId: pageId,\n                documentversion: documentversion,\n                blurbtext: blurbtext,\n                csrfmiddlewaretoken: csrftoken\n            },\n            success: function (data) {\n                if (data['message']) {\n                    alert(data['message']);\n                }\n            },\n            error: function (xqXHR, textStatus) {\n                window.status = textStatus;\n                debugger;\n            }\n\n        });\n\n    };\n\n\n</script>\n\n<script>\n    jQuery(document).ajaxSend(function (event, xhr, settings) {\n        function getCookie(name) {\n            var cookieValue = null;\n            if (document.cookie && document.cookie != '') {\n                var cookies = document.cookie.split(';');\n                for (var i = 0; i < cookies.length; i++) {\n                    var cookie = jQuery.trim(cookies[i]);\n                    // Does this cookie string begin with the name we want?\n                    if (cookie.substring(0, name.length + 1) == (name + '=')) {\n                        cookieValue = decodeURIComponent(cookie.substring(name.length + 1));\n                        break;\n                    }\n                }\n            }\n            return cookieValue;\n        }\n\n        function sameOrigin(url) {\n            // url could be relative or scheme relative or absolute\n            var host = document.location.host; // host + port\n            var protocol = document.location.protocol;\n            var sr_origin = '//' + host;\n            var origin = protocol + sr_origin;\n            // Allow absolute or scheme relative URLs to same origin\n            return (url == origin || url.slice(0, origin.length + 1) == origin + '/') ||\n                (url == sr_origin || url.slice(0, sr_origin.length + 1) == sr_origin + '/') ||\n                // or any other URL that isn't scheme relative or absolute i.e relative.\n                !(/^(\\/\\/|http:|https:).*/.test(url));\n        }\n\n        function safeMethod(method) {\n            return (/^(GET|HEAD|OPTIONS|TRACE)$/.test(method));\n        }\n\n        if (!safeMethod(settings.type) && sameOrigin(settings.url)) {\n            xhr.setRequestHeader("X-CSRFToken", getCookie('csrftoken'));\n        }\n    });\n</script>\n\n\n\n    \n\n<!-- Modal
